Our Philosophy
Three decades of building India’s cultural landmarks.

At 32ND, we’ve always believed that the value of real estate is not just in the square footage but in the soul of the space. That philosophy has guided us since inception, leading us to create one of a kind experiential spaces.

We build places that change the way India eats, lives, and gathers.

Our portfolio is designed with one intention:
to create cultural landmarks that last.

Introducing The Sanctuaries by 32ND Manesar

This is our boldest step yet.
Our first residential foray in Delhi NCR.

Every plot is one acre, designed as a sanctuary of higher-end luxury, and timeless permanence.

This is more than an opportunity — it is built to last, to inspire, and to endure as family legacies.

Our newest address — designed to grow in both value and meaning.

Why Manesar?

Manesar is India’s next growth corridor — strategically on NH-48 and powered by new expressways and transit links, set to become North India’s epicentre for living and culture.

Cleaner Air, Healthier Living

Manesar offers a measurable air quality advantage over Gurugram. Lower traffic density and abundant greenery ensure better AQI levels, proximity to the Aravalli hills creates a healthier, more breathable microclimate.

The Neighbourhood

Already tied into the infrastructure web of NCR’s future, Manesar is further elevated by the upcoming Disneyland-scale entertainment destination.

Growth & Investment Momentum

Manesar today is where Gurugram was 20 years ago — undervalued, underbuilt, yet poised for rapid transformation.

CLU Security (Change of Land Use)

Every parcel comes with CLU approval, ensuring compliance and protection against regulatory uncertainty. This de-risks ownership compared to informal farmhouse belts, making this a secure and future-proof investment.

The Neighbourhood

Close enough to Delhi NCR’s dynamic pulse, yet set apart for privacy and sanctuary. Manesar offers the rare combination of access and retreat.

20 mins from Proposed Disneyland Site

Just 20 minutes from the proposed Disneyland India site, 32ND, Manesar sits at the edge of what is set to become one of the country’s most transformative lifestyle destinations.

This entertainment hub is poised to draw millions of visitors annually, redefining NCR as a global tourism and leisure magnet.

Disneyland in Gurgaon: Haryana CM says talks on for India’s first Mickey Mouse & Co park near Manesar

Synopsis
Gurgaon may soon have India's first Disneyland. The Haryana government is discussing the project with Disney. A 500-acre site near Manesar has been identified. The amusement park is expected to boost tourism and create jobs. It will be located near the KMP Expressway. The government also plans to expand other tourist events.

Gurgaon may soon become home to India's first Disneyland amusement park. Haryana chief minister Nayab Singh Saini on Wednesday said the state government is in talks with Disney officials and has identified 500 acres of land near Pachgaon Chowk in Manesar for the project, a TOI report stated.

Disneyland in Gurgaon: India’s First Theme Park Planned Near Manesar
Written by: Team Angel One • Updated on: 7 Jul 2025, 11:39 am IST

Haryana CM confirms talks with Disney to open India’s 1st Disneyland near Manesar on a 500-acre site beside KMP Expressway.

Strategic Location and Connectivity Boost
The theme park will be located near key transit hubs, including Dwarka Expressway, Delhi–Gurgaon Expressway and the upcoming Global City project, which spans 1,000 acres. This smart township will support walk-to-work modules, connecting Disneyland with residential, commercial and retail zones. The integration of high-speed mobility networks places this park within easy reach of both domestic and international tourists, amplifying its appeal.

Design & Integrated Living

At 32ND, design is never an afterthought — it is the foundation.

At Manesar, one-acre plots, amenities, and green corridors are designed as a seamless ecosystem — thoughtful in layout, balanced in scale, and connected in flow.

Our strength lies in design and detail. From architecture and interiors to landscape and shared spaces, every element is shaped with rigour and permanence, creating environments that elevate everyday living into something extraordinary.

32ND Farmhouse Estates

An elevated expression of one-acre living.
Bespoke residences designed and built by us, with the same architectural rigour, hospitality sensibility, and commitment to permanence that define our legacy.

Estates are our higher-end vision: one-acre properties where architecture, landscape, and lifestyle converge in permanence.

Avail Price on Request.

We build for permanence, not for seasons.
Our legacy is measured not just in structures,
but in the lives they inspire.

Our Ethos

To use materials that weather into beauty,

To partner with artisans who embed tradition into modernity,

To build extraordinary environments that stand the test of time.

and to ensure every home becomes a legacy.

Great design isn’t built alone. It’s built with the world’s best minds, and we’ve done it time and again.

Our design philosophy is rooted in collaboration. Working with global visionaries such as Bill Bensley and Pablo Luna, and empowering local artisans, we create places where tradition and modernity coexist seamlessly.

Horticulture & Landscaping

Most projects treat landscaping as finishing. We treat it as foundation. Every green corridor, orchard, and courtyard is curated with the same thought and permanence as the homes themselves.

With 32ND, the land isn’t just built upon, it’s brought to life.

In Vagator, Goa
we have delivered horticulture that blends seamlessly with the coast and culture.

At 32ND Avenue, Gurugram,
our landscapes are celebrated as international-standard public spaces.

At 32ND, we are creating

It is more than land; it is a complete environment:

• Hospitality at your doorstep, from dining to effortless hosting.
• Landscapes that deepen in beauty over time.
• Management that makes living seamless.

And for those who choose, the option of bespoke estates designed and built by us. (Price on Request)
